title: The Queen's Gambit
overview: Orphaned at the age of nine, prodigious introvert Beth Harmon discovers and masters the game of chess in 1960s USA.

title: Stranger Things
overview: A group of young friends in 1980s Indiana witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits.

title: Breaking Bad
overview: A high school chemistry teacher turns to a life of crime after a terminal cancer diagnosis.

title: The Crown
overview: A chronicle of the life of Queen Elizabeth II from the 1940s to modern times.

title: Game of Thrones
overview: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns.

title: The Mandalorian
overview: A lone gunfighter makes his way through the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: Friends
overview: Follows the personal and professional lives of six twenty to thirty-something friends living in Manhattan.

title: Sherlock
overview: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: Westworld
overview: A dark odyssey about the dawn of artificial consciousness and the evolution of sin.

title: The Witcher
overview: Geralt of Rivia, a mutated monster-hunter for hire, journeys toward his destiny in a turbulent world.

title: Narcos
overview: A gritty crime drama chronicling the rise and fall of Pablo Escobar and the Medellín cartel, followed by the DEA's pursuit of the Cali cartel.

title: The Office (US)
overview: A mockumentary on a group of typical office workers, where the workday consists of ego clashes, inappropriate behavior, and tedium.
awards: Golden Globe Award for Steve Carell

title: Money Heist
overview: A criminal mastermind who goes by 'The Professor' plans the biggest heist in recorded history to print billions of euros in the Royal Mint of Spain.

title: House of Cards
overview: A ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife manipulate their way to power in Washington, D.C.

title: The Flash
overview: After being struck by lightning, Barry Allen wakes from his coma to discover he's been given the power of super speed.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
overview: In a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

title: Vikings1
overview: The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok, a legendary Viking chieftain and farmer, and his crew.

title: Supernatural
overview: Two brothers follow their father's footsteps as hunters who battle paranormal beings, demons, and monsters.

title: The Big Bang Theory
overview: A woman who moves into an apartment next to two brilliant but socially awkward physicists shows them how little they know about life outside the lab.

title: Dark
overview: A family saga with a supernatural twist, set in a German town where the disappearance of two young children exposes the relationships among four families.

title: Better Things
overview: A single mother and working actress balances the challenges of raising her three daughters in Los Angeles.

title: The Expanse
overview: A detective and a rogue ship captain investigate a vast conspiracy that threatens the solar system's fragile peace.

title: The Witcher: Blood Origin
overview: Set 1200 years before the events of The Witcher, this limited series explores the origins of the first Witcher and the events that led to the 'Conjunction of the Spheres.'

title: The Twilight Zone
overview: An anthology series featuring tales of the strange, mysterious, and macabre with unexpected twists and social commentary.

title: The Good Place
overview: A woman finds herself in the afterlife’s 'Good Place,' but realizes she doesn’t belong there and tries to become a better person to avoid being sent to the Bad Place.

title: How I Met Your Mother
overview: A father recounts to his children the story of how he met their mother, sharing tales of friendship and love along the way.

title: Stranger Things 4
overview: The gang faces new supernatural threats and personal challenges in the town of Hawkins during the 1980s.

title: Peaky Blinders
overview: A gangster family epic set in 1919 Birmingham, England, centered on a gang who sew razor blades in their caps.

title: Cobra Kai
overview: Decades after their 1984 showdown, Johnny Lawrence and Daniel LaRusso rekindle their rivalry in a new generation of karate kids.

title: Chernobyl
overview: A dramatization of the 1986 nuclear disaster and the cleanup efforts that followed in Soviet Ukraine.

title: The Expanse
overview: A thriller set two hundred years in the future, The Expanse follows a conspiracy that threatens the solar system's fragile state of cold war.

title: Mindhunter
overview: In the late 1970s, two FBI agents expand criminal science by delving into the psychology of murder and getting uneasily close to all-too-real monsters.

title: Vikings
overview: The adventures of Ragnar Lothbrok, a legendary Viking chieftain and farmer, and his crew.

title: Black Mirror
overview: An anthology series exploring a twisted, high-tech world where humanity's greatest innovations and darkest instincts collide.

title: The Crown
overview: Follows the political rivalries and romance of Queen Elizabeth II’s reign and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: Ozark
overview: A financial advisor drags his family from Chicago to the Missouri Ozarks, where he must launder money to appease a drug cartel boss.

title: House of Cards
overview: A ruthless congressman and his equally ambitious wife manipulate their way to power in Washington, D.C.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
overview: Comedy series following a team of detectives in the NYPD's 99th Precinct, balancing crime solving with hilarious antics.

title: The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel
overview: In 1950s New York, a housewife discovers her talent for stand-up comedy and pursues a career in the male-dominated comedy world.

title: Mr. Robot
overview: A cybersecurity engineer and hacker with dissociative identity disorder is recruited by an anarchist to bring down corporate America.

title: True Detective
overview: Seasonal anthology series in which police investigations unearth personal and professional secrets of those involved, both within and outside the law.
awards: Golden Globe Award for Best Actor (Mahershala Ali)

title: The Boys
overview: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.

title: Money Heist
overview: A criminal mastermind called 'The Professor' orchestrates heists on the Royal Mint of Spain and the Bank of Spain with a group of uniquely skilled criminals.

title: Rick and Morty
overview: An animated series that follows the exploits of a super scientist and his not-so-bright grandson.

title: The Walking Dead
overview: Sheriff's deputy Rick Grimes wakes from a coma to learn the world is in ruins, dominated by flesh-eating zombies.

title: Lost
overview: Survivors of a plane crash struggle to survive and unravel the mysteries of a strange island.

title: Dexter
overview: A Miami-based blood splatter expert moonlights as a serial killer of criminals who evade justice.

title: The Simpsons
overview: The satirical adventures of a working-class family in the misfit city of Springfield.

title: House
overview: An antisocial maverick doctor who specializes in diagnostic medicine does whatever it takes to solve puzzling cases.

title: The Handmaid's Tale
overview: In a dystopian future, a woman is forced to live as a concubine under a fundamentalist theocratic dictatorship.

title: Lucifer
overview: Lucifer Morningstar, the Devil, abandons Hell for Los Angeles where he runs a nightclub and becomes a consultant to the LAPD.

title: Lost in Space
overview: The Robinson family fights for survival after crash-landing on a mysterious alien planet in this reimagining of the classic sci-fi series.
awards: Primetime Emmy nomination for visual effects

title: House of the Dragon
overview: Set 200 years before Game of Thrones, House of the Dragon chronicles the beginning of the end of House Targaryen.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
overview: A modern reimagining of Shirley Jackson's classic novel, exploring a family confronting traumatic memories and terrifying supernatural events.
awards: Saturn Award for Best Horror Television Series

title: Loki
overview: The God of Mischief, Loki, steps out of his brother's shadow to embark on his own adventures after the events of Avengers: Endgame.

title: The Umbrella Academy
overview: A dysfunctional family of adopted sibling superheroes reunite to solve the mystery of their father's death and the threat of an impending apocalypse.

title: Stranger Things 4
overview: In the fourth season, the kids face new supernatural threats, uncover dark secrets, and battle the terrifying Vecna.

title: Better Call Saul
overview: The trials and tribulations of criminal lawyer Jimmy McGill before he becomes the sleazy lawyer Saul Goodman.

title: Stranger Things 3
overview: In the third season, the kids face new supernatural challenges and a growing evil force beneath Hawkins.

title: Peaky Blinders: The Bloody Season
overview: A documentary-style series exploring the history and impact of the Peaky Blinders gang in early 20th century England.
Counterterrorism agent Jack Bauer races against the clock to subvert terrorist plots and save his country in this real-time thriller.

title: Succession
overview: The Roy family, owners of a global media and entertainment empire, struggle for control of the company amid uncertain health of the patriarch.

title: Schitt's Creek
overview: A wealthy family loses their fortune and is forced to live in a small town they once bought as a joke, rebuilding their lives with humor and heart.

title: Mad Men
overview: Set in the 1960s, follows the professional and personal lives of advertising executives on Madison Avenue in New York City.

title: Homeland
overview: A bipolar CIA operative becomes convinced that a rescued American POW has been turned by al-Qaeda and poses a threat to the United States.

title: The Sopranos
overview: New Jersey mob boss Tony Soprano deals with personal and professional issues in his home and business life, seeking therapy to cope with his problems.

title: The Leftovers
overview: Three years after 2% of the world's population mysteriously disappears, those left behind struggle to find meaning and normalcy.

title: Deadwood
overview: In the 1870s, the town of Deadwood, South Dakota is a lawless settlement in the American West, where residents seek their fortunes amid corruption.

title: Arrested Development
overview: The Bluth family’s dysfunctional relationships are the centerpiece of this sitcom that follows the fallout of the patriarch's imprisonment.

title: Fargo
overview: Various chronicles of deception, intrigue and murder in and around frozen Minnesota. Inspired by the 1996 film of the same name.

title: Rick and Morty Season 4
overview: The mad scientist Rick Sanchez and his good-hearted but easily distressed grandson Morty go on dangerous, outlandish adventures across the cosmos and alternate realities.

title: Westworld
overview: Set in a technologically advanced Wild-West-themed amusement park populated by android hosts, where guests can live out their fantasies without consequences.
